<box align="text-center">
====== Template Layout Elements ======
<text lead>The beauty's design</text>

{{docs:layout:component:undraw_website_builder_re_ii6e.png?0x250&ratio=21:9}}


Every [[:docs:theme:template:template|template]] is composed of elements that create a ''layout'' design.


They can use:
<box width="fit-content" align="text-start center">
  * All elements (ie the [[:docs:theme:template:holy|holy template]])
  * to no element at all (ie the [[:docs:theme:template:blank|blank template]])
</box>
\\
\\

{{:docs:theme:element:layout_element.svg?0x250 }}

</box>



^ Element ^ Description ^
| [[:docs:theme:element:main|main]] | the main element is where the content of the page is rendered |
| [[:docs:theme:element:main-header|main header]] | the header of the [[main|main element]] |
| [[:docs:theme:element:main-footer|main footer]] | the footer of the [[main|main element]] |
| [[:docs:theme:element:page-side|page side (or sidebar)]] | the sidebar is located at the side of the ''main area'' (all main elements) |
| [[:docs:theme:element:page-header|page header]] | the page header (known as a fat header) is located at the top of your page |
| [[:docs:theme:element:page-footer|page footer]] | the page footer (known as a fat footer) is located at the bottom of your page |
| [[:docs:theme:slot:railbar|railbar]] | the action menu is located at the end/right side of your page |
